Method Detail

AddText

public bool AddText( std::string refName, const char* inString, int x, int y, bool visible );
Adds a text object at the specified key value or updates the object currently at that key value.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the text object.
inString - The string of the text object.
x - The x coordinate for the text object's position.
y - The y coordinate for the text object's position.
visible - true if the text object is to be displayed, false if it only exists to be read
Returns:
true if the text object is successfully added, false otherwise

AddText

public bool AddText( std::string refName, std::string textString, int x, int y, bool visible );
Adds a text object at the specified key value or updates the object currently at that key value.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the text object.
textString - The string of the text object.
x - The x coordinate for the text object's position.
y - The y coordinate for the text object's position.
visible - true if the text object is to be displayed, false if it only exists to be read
Returns:
true if the text object is successfully added, false otherwise

AddTextByRef

public bool AddTextByRef( std::string refName, std::string assetName, int x, int y, bool visible );
Adds a text object at the specified key value or updates the object currently at that key value using the string specified at the given asset name in the text XML file.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the text object.
assetName - The asset name at which to get the string for the text object.
x - The x coordinate for the text object's position.
y - The y coordinate for the text object's position.
visible - true if the text object is to be displayed, false if it only exists to be read
Returns:
true if the text object is successfully added, false otherwise

ChangeText

public bool ChangeText( std::string refName, std::string textString );
Changes the associated string for the text object at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the text object.
textString - The new string for the text object.
Returns:
true if the text object is successfully updated, false otherwise

RemoveText

public bool RemoveText( std::string refName );
Removes the text object at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the text object.
Returns:
true if the text object is successfully removed, false otherwise

SetTextPosition

public void SetTextPosition( std::string refName, int x, int y );
Sets a new position for the text object at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the text object.
x - The new x coordinate to display the text at.
y - The new y coordinate to display the text at.

SetTTS

public void SetTTS( bool TTS );
Sets a new position for the text object at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the text object.
x - The new x coordinate to display the text at.
y - The new y coordinate to display the text at.

ShowAllVisible

public void ShowAllVisible( BITMAP* dest );
Displays and/or reads all the text objects that are visible.
Parameters:
dest - The Allegro BITMAP to display the text on.

ShowText

public bool ShowText( std::string refName, int setVisible, BITMAP* bmp );
Displays and/or reads the text object at the specified key value onto the specified BITMAP.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the text object.
setVisible - Zero if the string should only be read, non-zero to display and read.
bmp - The BITMAP on which to display the text.
Returns:
true if the text object is successfully displayed, false otherwise
